alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Santa Susana Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 1:47PM PST until November 09 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph are expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph in favored mountain locations. * WHERE...Santa Susana Mountains, Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Eastern San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Santa Susana Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
